subject: Boats and Boating
Sailboats and Sailing
lead_paragraph: The newcomer Andy Campbell of San Diego and crew Mike Nichol of Miami edged out the Olympians Marc Pickel of Germany and crew Steve Mitchell of Britain to win the fifth race of the Bacardi Cup in Biscayne Bay off Miami on Thursday. The two teams had a bow-to-bow duel on the last upwind leg with the Americans managing to keep their speed up through the finish line while the German team slowed a bit as it glided to the finish. The overall leaders Peter Bromby and crew Magnus Liljedhal, both Olympians and Bacardi Cup champions, finished 24th in the 64-boat fleet to keep the No. 1 slot. boats.
